means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 阿斯丘住所名称，来源于古诺斯语，含义是“栎树+树林”(oak+wood)

sentence.Network_en: His glasses had been knocked askew by the blow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的眼镜一下子被打歪了。

sentence.Network_en: There were no shutters at the windows, and some of the doors hung askew.
sentence.Network_cn: 窗户上没有百叶窗，有几扇门也歪歪扭扭的。
她站在那里，歪戴着帽子。

GRE考试2012新增词汇汇总-GRE考试-考试吧 ... arrant a. 彻头彻尾的, 臭名昭著的 askew a. 斜的 avouch n. 宣称, 断言.
歪字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 歪歪倒倒〖 unsteady〗 歪歪扭扭〖 crooked;askew;beshapelessandtwisted〗 歪歪斜斜〖 tremulous〗.

09年高考英语备考研讨... ... 35.以德报怨 requite evil with good 36.歪了 be askew 37.因失败受责备 be blamed for the failure.

entry.def: Something that is askew is not straight or not level with what it should be level with.

example.tran: 她站在那里，歪戴着帽子。

example.ex: There were no shutters at the windows, and some of the doors hung askew.
example.tran: 窗户上没有百叶窗，有几扇门也歪歪扭扭的。

means.word_mean: 1. turned or twisted toward one side;

sentences.sentence: "a...youth with a gorgeous red necktie all awry"- G.K.Chesterton
"his wig was, as the British say, skew-whiff"
